Name: Uncommon Tag
Effect: Shop has an Uncommon Joker

Name: Rare Tag
Effect: Shop has a Rare Joker

Name: Negative Tag
Effect: Next base edition shop Joker becomes Negative

Name: Foil Tag
Effect: Next base edition shop Joker becomes Foil

Name: Holographic Tag
Effect: Next base edition shop Joker becomes Holographic

Name: Polychrome Tag
Effect: Next base edition shop Joker becomes Polychrome

Name: Investment Tag
Effect: After defeating the Boss Blind, gain $15

Name: Voucher Tag
Effect: Adds one Voucher to the next shop

Name: Boss Tag
Effect: Rerolls the Boss Blind

Name: Standard Tag
Effect: Gives a free Mega Standard Pack

Name: Charm Tag
Effect: Gives a free Mega Arcana Pack

Name: Meteor Tag
Effect: Gives a free Mega Celestial Pack

Name: Buffoon Tag
Effect: Gives a free Mega Buffoon Pack

Name: Handy Tag
Effect: Gives $1 per played hand this run. Will give $x

Name: Garbage Tag
Effect: Gives $1 per unused discard this run. Will give $x

Name: Ethereal Tag
Effect: Gives a free Spectral Pack

Name: Coupon Tag
Effect: Initial cards and booster packs in next shop are free

Name: Double Tag
Effect: Gives a copy of the next selected Tag. Double Tag excluded

Name: Juggle Tag
Effect: +3 hand size next round

Name: D6 Tag
Effect: Rerolls in next shop start at $0

Name: Top-Up Tag
Effect: Create up to 2 common Jokers. Must have room

Name: Speed Tag
Effect: Gives $5 per skipped Blind this run. Will give $x

Name: Orbital Tag
Effect: Upgrade [Random Poker Hand] by 3 levels

Name: Economy Tag
Effect: Doubles your money. Max of $40
